english_example_sentence: You are buying fresh vegetables from the market every week.
russian_example_sentence: Вы каждую неделю покупаете свежие овощи на рынке.
turkish_example_sentence: Siz her hafta marketten taze sebzeler satın alıyorsunuz.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Siz her hafta marketten taze sebzeler ______.
